This sample demonstrates multiple things:
* Using an overlapping model
* Reading a sample from a tilemap
* Using Tessera in an "autotiling" style where the basic tiles are already picked, and Tessera just selects the most appriopriate tile matching each basic tile.


Pixelliverse tiles from 
https://zrghr.itch.io/pixelliverse-plains
License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
